description: Episode of Series "Acquaintance Rape". Dramatizes the occurrence of sexual assault between teenage acquaintances through an episode involving a teenage girl and the intimate advances of her dancing partner. Points out various factors which contribute to the dancing partner's sexual assault, and emphasises the need for young people to understand their own sexual values and those of others.
